landing.title: KattBNB is coming soon!
landing.paragraph: Good things take time! But they are also worth the wait. We are working hard to get the best cat boarding site up and running. Stay tuned!

PasswordReset.error-header: Password reset could not be completed because of following error(s):
PasswordReset.title: Request password reset
PasswordReset.instructions: Fill in the email you registered with.

PasswordResetSuccess.title: Successful password reset request!
PasswordResetSuccess.p: You have successfully requested a password reset! To continue, please follow the instructions we have sent to your email. If you didn't receive our message in your inbox, please refer to our <1>FAQ</1> section.

Signup.error-header: User could not be registered because of following error(s):
Signup.title: Sign up
Signup.instructions: Password must be at least 6 characters in length. Email and Username must be unique.
Signup.captcha-label: Type the code you see above

SignupSuccess.title: Successful signup!
SignupSuccess.p: Welcome, you have successfully signed up for KattBNB! You will need to confirm your email address in the next 24 hours in order to log in and start using our services. To continue, please follow the instructions we have sent to your email. If you didn't receive our message in your inbox, please refer to our <1>FAQ</1> section.

You didn't input the captcha phrase corr: You didn't input the captcha phrase correctly, please try again!
